sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../styles/tour-details.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating"; import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg"; const TourDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); // Pastikan tour ada sebelum mengakses propertinya if (!tour) { return

Tour not found

; } const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, maxGroupSize, distance, } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; return (

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? "Not Rated" : avgRating} {totalRating !== 0 && ( ({reviews.length} reviews) )} {address}
{city} ${price} k/m ${distance} /person {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/* tour reviews section */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{reviews?.map((review) => (
Zidane

{new Date("08-24-2024").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Amazing Tours
))}
{/* tour reviews section end */}
); }; export default TourDetail;
